trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_00<tab>Something in the air has Ponnixia distressed.

TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_01<tab>Malevolent sylphs have been working their mischief on the forest's mushrooms, lacing them with a poisonous powder that coaxes them to emit toxic fumes. Wash them with spring water to spare the sylphs of Little Solace from a coughing epidemic.
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_02<tab>You have doused the mushrooms, removing their poisonous properties. Inform Ponnixia she may breathe easy again.
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_SEQ_03<tab>Ponnixia takes a deep breath, savoring the clean, crisp forest air. Once again, you have proven yourself a true friend to Little Solace and its inhabitants.
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_TODO_00<tab>Douse the greater banestools with spring water.
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_000<tab>Just when this one thought touched ones couldn't get any nastier! Does friendly one smell something funny in the air?
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_001<tab>This one saw touched ones scattering strange powder on stinkshrooms, making nasty stink even stinkier! These ones cannot stop sniffling and sneezing.
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_002<tab>Please, friendly one! Wash nasty one's nasty powder off of stinkshrooms, before all of these ones become sickly ones.
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_005<tab>Please, friendly one! Wash powder off of stinkshrooms, before all of these ones become sickly ones.
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_010<tab>This one's nose has stopped tingling. Friendly one has cleaned stinkshrooms of their stink, yes?
TEXT_BANSYL203_01269_PONNIXIA_000_011<tab>These ones breathe a sigh of relief. Ahhhhhh, does friendly one not too love the sweet smells of the forest?
